channel.title: [Request/Suggestion] Is there any tutorial on how to configure other virtual OS to the whonix gateway?
channel.description: It is because some functions are disable in whonix workstation. Also I would like to create netvm in kvm that are connected to whonix-gateway. Thanks

item.title: [Request/Suggestion] Is there any tutorial on how to configure other virtual OS to the whonix gateway?

item.description:
Whonix – 20 May 20

Other Operating Systems - Whonix

Anonymize any Operating System! Your operating system tunneled through the Tor Anonymity Network! Create your Whonix-Custom-Workstation ™!
